headline: Jim Cramer on Ulta Beauty (ULTA): “Please Don’t Trade It, Just Own It”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer’s Game Plan: 12 Stocks in Focus. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ABC stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. headline: Nvidia, Salesforce, Kohl's: Earnings to Watch This Week
summary: Asking for a Trend's Josh Lipton takes a look ahead to this week's biggest earnings releases, including chipmaker Nvidia (NVDA), Salesforce (CRM), sports retailer Dick's Sporting Goods (DKS), and Kohl's (KSS) To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.
